CustomField.description: KM: This contact should not receive the Brightcove NPS Survey. This is for reps/AMs to manage their NPS contacts without having to remove them from a contact role or make them an invalid contact just so they won't receive the NPS email.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box if you do not want this contact to receive the NPS email.
CustomField.label: Do Not Receive NPS Survey
